arts.ttl: Wolfsburg and Cologne share the spoils in six-goal thriller to remain unbeaten
arts.sum: Christian Eriksen, recently signed by Wolfsburg on a free transfer, was named on the bench for the hosts as head coach Paul Simonis made two changes from their 1-1 draw against Mainz, bringing in Mohamed Amoura and Joakim Mæhle for their first starts of the season. Cologne thought they had retaken the lead in the 56th minute when Bülter turned in a free-kick from Ísak Jóhannesson – who had replaced Waldschmidt at half-time – but after a lengthy VAR review, referee Dankert ruled out the goal for a foul in the build-up.

arts.ttl: Report: Maina dropped from Köln's squad to face Wolfsburg
arts.sum: News has emanated from the Effzeh camp that the fleet-footed winger has been dismissed from Lukas Kwasniok's current plans.
